title: Inca (1992) (PC Game) (HereticXS)
description:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Inca (1992) (PC Game)
Released by HereticXS - specializing in authentic releases of old-school games.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This release was ripped from an authentic physical CD of the original MS-DOS
media. It includes bin/cue CD image files of the original installation CD.

This release includes LaunchBox (and DOSBox) which will allow you to easily play
the game on modern Windows PCs. No configuration or installation is necessary.
Simply run LaunchBox.exe and then double-click on the game to play.

You are a space pilot who can travel through time. Now your mission is to land
in South America at the time of the European invasion, and find the mysterious
treasure of the great Inca civilization.

Inca is a game that combines adventure and action, or to put it more correctly,
it's an adventure game with many action elements (such as space combat).
